generalSessions.name: Shelby County General Sessions Court - Civil Division
generalSessions.parking: Public parking available around the courthouse

criminalCourt.name: Shelby County Criminal Court
criminalCourt.note: Handles criminal traffic matters (DUI, reckless driving, etc.)

municipal.name: Memphis City Court
municipal.note: Handles city traffic citations within Memphis city limits

trafficViolationsBureau.name: Memphis Traffic Violations Bureau
trafficViolationsBureau.address: 201 Poplar Ave, Suite LL71, Memphis, TN 38103
trafficViolationsBureau.note: For payment and information on city traffic tickets

suburbanMunicipal.description: Suburban municipalities have their own courts

districtAttorney.trafficDivision: Contact main number for traffic matters

publicDefender.note: Available for indigent defendants in criminal traffic cases

contestingTicket.deadline: City tickets: 7 days; County tickets: check citation
process: Memphis city tickets: Appear at City Court or plead online
County tickets: Appear at General Sessions Court
Request court date at time of appearance
Discovery requests filed through court clerk

courtDates.continuances: Contact court clerk at least 48 hours before court date
courtDates.noShow: Failure to appear results in capias (bench warrant) and license hold

diversionProgram.name: Shelby County Judicial Diversion Program
eligibility: No DUI or serious bodily injury
requirements: Pay court costs and diversion fee

trafficSchool.deadline: Must complete within time specified by court (usually 90 days)

localRules.dressCode: Business casual recommended; no shorts, flip flops, or revealing attire
localRules.electronics: Cell phones permitted but must be silenced
localRules.weapons: No weapons; courthouse has security screening
localRules.checkIn: Arrive 30 minutes early for security screening

specialConsiderations.schoolZones: Enhanced fines; 25 MPH during school hours
specialConsiderations.constructionZones: Double fines in active construction zones

parking.note: Downtown parking can be limited; arrive early

legalAid.name: Memphis Area Legal Services
legalAid.note: Free legal assistance for qualifying individuals

lawyerReferral.name: Memphis Bar Association Lawyer Referral Service
